frontend/src/components/auth/register-fo.description: Register form uses lucide-react icons (User, Mail, Lock, Eye, EyeOff) with a consistent pattern: icons positioned absolute in a relative wrapper div, left-3 positioned, centered vertically with -translate-y-1/2, size w-5 h-5, color text-muted-foreground. Input fields need pl-10 class for proper icon spacing.
